description: Nero CoverDesigner allows casual users and professionals to create visually appealing packaging for media collections, including designing disc labels, case inserts, and booklets. Users can import images, add text, and utilize simple graphic editing tools to create personalized designs, which they can then save as NCD files to preserve their progress.
NOTE: Nero CoverDesigner was included with Nero Multimedia Suite (beginning with Nero 6.6) but is now also available as a standalone application.
